comm.title: Governance Committe
comm.subtitle: The importance of involving key production sectors in regional economic development is a success to the region.

colab.title: CIITA Collaborators
colab.subtitle: CIITA is Innovation and Knowledge
colab.texta: Our collaborators depend on disruptive ideas.
colab.textb: They recognize that the future depends on new digital ideas, and that they will find them here.
